translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

Acknowledging the receipt of the letters Your Excellency’s 14 and 15 of the current month, I must in response say, regarding the first, that I am certain Your Excellency informed Faria Faria, to whom I commanded the fulfillment of the orders transmitted therein, and regarding the second, with the orders to Rafael Teixeira Marins and Captain Joaquim Gomes de Araújo, your request regarding the goods purchased from the latter is satisfied.

God keep Your Excellency  
Secretariat of Treasury Affairs in Piratini, January 19, 1839.  
Domingos José de Almeida

Most Illustrious Sir João Antônio da Silveira. Worthy Commander of the Right Division.

Here is the order to give the doctor of Alegrete the 200 patacões that Your Excellency Almeida...
